<heading>

Attributes

  • @position

Content Model

( #PCDATA | color | foreign | material | material_format | plant | profession | tool )*

May Contain:

  • PCDATA
  • <color>
  • <foreign>
  • <material>
  • <material_format>
  • <plant>
  • <profession>
  • <tool>

May be contained in:

  • <entry>
  • <entry_group>
